info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: combines the output of multiple featureCounts runs in one CSV file

param.name: searchFolder
param.description: path to the folder in which *.counts files are located

param.name: statsFolder
param.description: path to merged statistic folder required for plotting

param.name: featureAnnotation
param.description: annotation file which is joined with the count file

param.name: featureAnnotationID
param.description: name of the column with is used for joining

param.name: featureAnnotationType
param.description: name of the column in the annotation file for which a distribution plot is created

param.name: featureAnnotationExonLength
param.description: name of the column that contains the exon length of the features

param.name: noPlotting
param.description: disables the execution of R scripts

param.name: prefixNames
param.description: prefixes the names of the features with continuous numbers

var.name: mergedCountFile
var.description: absolute path to the merged count file in CSV format
